content: Visit "aka.ms/pintfeedbackportal" to see your own people notes. Smart Notes (representation of People Notes in LPC) is available for MSIT users (see screenshot to the right).
Here is how we envision People Notes:

The People Notes effort created a foundation for personalization and a new breed of AI-first people experiences, introducing LLM enabled short-term and long-term memory capabilities in the Microsoft People Graph. People notes are extracted from raw data and stored in a storage for consumption. While the architecture for supporting such extract and storage can be implemented in many different ways (ranging from a long text, a blob or a document, or as annotation in a graph), the general components that can be considered for People Notes can be still discussed.
